concept.title: What is division
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is division.

conbody.p: The term "division" represents a mathematical operation. Division is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Division allows you to find the quotient of two numbers.
You use the division (/) button to express the division operation in the app.
In the division process, you take a number and split it into equal parts based on another number. That is, we divide one number by another.
